text: [Music]
TBT focus on three key areas ID
validation location intelligence and
fraud analytics we look after some big
ecommerce businesses over in the States
we look after some of the largest banks
in Asia and a lot of household names
across Europe as well we wanted to give
our customers a greater experience
greater response rates and greater
reliability so to do that we wanted to
move away from what we would classify go
see on Prem infrastructure and move to a
more innovative future-proof
architecture now where we see an
opportunity within AWS is actually not
only get to a continuous deployment and
continuous integration phase but also be
able to put our services into micro
services so really scaled down the size
of our monolith applications so not only
are we saving huge money but we're
actually giving our customers a richer
experience and we ever have done before
and we've done that in two really big
key areas one is that we've got our
releases up to 50 times a day
previously we was doing roughly five a
quarter so we were talking the
significant percentage increase in
releases now releases of bug fixes
feature enhancements so giving our
customers some feature-rich and greater
data sets and also our uptime and
scalability gbg have a few core
platforms that are integral to many of
our products and one of those is a
dotnet service that we refer to as
landline verification and one of our key
challenges was how we cope with the
ever-growing demand for that service so
we decided to migrate that into a double
us so we can scale on demand by using
AWS we've been able to accelerate into
markets quicker than ever before
and by making huge savings in resource
and operational tasks we've been able to
focus on the innovation about our
products and really drive our platforms
for
[Music]
